pre_caption: The video starts with a wide shot, where a black and white checkerboard crosswalk occupies the foreground and center. A man in a light green shirt walks from the right foreground towards the left foreground across this crosswalk. In the middle ground, to the right, a cyclist and a yellow taxi move towards the camera. On the left middle ground, another man in a yellow-green jacket walks near a flower stand, with buildings in the background. As the crosswalk pattern changes to white abstract lines, a white animated paint bucket icon briefly appears on it. The camera then pans left, transitioning to a full shot, as a woman with pink hair enters from the right middle ground, walking towards the center foreground across the abstract crosswalk. An older Asian man follows her from the right middle ground, and the man in the yellow-green jacket is also visible further to the right in the middle ground, all moving towards the center foreground. A "Brushes" UI element appears superimposed in the top right. The woman in the center foreground then transforms into an animated character, followed by the man in the yellow-green jacket who also animates as he moves towards the center foreground. The camera remains at the subjects' level throughout.
